snippet: When an expert declarer is in a contract that looks hopeless, he will look for a winning layout.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the Open Teams semi-final at the Gold Coast Congress in Surfers Paradise, Queensland, Australia.
lead_paragraph: When an expert declarer is in a contract that looks hopeless, he will look for a winning layout.

headline.seo: Tom Hanlon Plays Smart Bridge at Gold Coast Congress
